chunk:
Biossance Squalane + Elderberry Jelly Cleanser

Brand: Biossance

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, GLYCERIN, WATER/AQUA/EAU, SQUALANE, HYDROGENATED FARNESENE, SODIUM LAUROYL METHYL ISETHIONATE, SUCROSE LAURATE, SUCROSE STEARATE, POLYMNIA SONCHIFOLIA ROOT JUICE, ALPHA-GLUCAN OLIGOSACCHARIDE, SAMBUCUS NIGRA FRUIT

AMBUCUS NIGRA FRUIT EXTRACT, LACTOBACILLUS, IPOMOEA BATATAS ROOT EXTRACT, ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) BRAN EXTRACT, ACACIA SENEGAL GUM, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) EXTRACT, CAPRYLHYDROXAMIC ACID, SUCROSE PALMITATE, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT, PHENETHYL ALCOHOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, MALTODEXTRIN, TOCOPHEROL, CITRIC ACID.

Directions: Ap

CID.

Directions: Apply a small amount to dry skin and massage. Add water to emulsify and break down makeup and impurities. Rinse with warm water.

Warnings: Use only as directed. Do not use on broken or irritated skin. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a physician. Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

Ingredient concern
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
